short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension will set default search to Search UU. Use it by typing a query in the search field.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Greetings from SearchUU!

This Extension will set default search to SearchUU. Use it by typing a query in the search field. 

SearchUU Chrome extension will configure your new tab page to SearchUU.

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing SearchUU extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described:

Terms of Service: https://searchuu.com/tos.html 
Privacy Policy: https://searchuu.com/pp.html

Enjoy your search experience!
